channel.title: Privacy on Scratch Addons
channel.description: Recent content in Privacy on Scratch Addons

item.title: Chrome Web Store Privacy Information
item.description: This is how we fill the “privacy practices” form on the Chrome Web Store Developer Dashboard. Single purpose Allows users to customize their experience on the Scratch website (scratch.mit.edu) by providing previously unavailable features - including many related to reading and replying of Scratch messages/notifications. This extension makes use of the “Scratch API” (api.scratch.mit.edu). Permission justification Permission Justification Host permission Used to access information from, and run content scripts on the Scratch website.
